response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. We believe its value to you surpasses expectations, and we aim to make this acquisition as beneficial as possible. After careful consideration, we propose to sell the product to you at a price of $1,200,000. This offer reflects our commitment to fair pricing while ensuring a significant return on our investment. We are confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations, providing substantial value to your endeavors. Should you choose to accept this offer, we assure you of a seamless transaction and exceptional customer service throughout the process. If you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
